entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:29 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Humidity: 77 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:08 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:08 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
